title: Flaky test: test_load_vocabs
body:
http://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-cpu-unittest/detail/PR-692/7/pipeline/81/ 

```
=================================== FAILURES ===================================

_______________________________ test_load_vocabs _______________________________

[gw3] linux -- Python 3.6.7 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gluon-nlp-cpu-py3@4/conda/cpu/py3/bin/python



    @pytest.mark.remote_required

    def test_load_vocabs():

>       dataset = SQuAD(segment='dev', root='tests/data/squad')



scripts/tests/test_question_answering.py:70: 

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 

src/gluonnlp/data/question_answering.py:136: in __init__

    super(SQuAD, self).__init__(self._read_data())

src/gluonnlp/data/question_answering.py:174: in _read_data

    samples = json.load(f)

conda/cpu/py3/lib/python3.6/json/__init__.py:299: in load

    parse_constant=parse_constant, object_pairs_hook=object_pairs_hook, **kw)

conda/cpu/py3/lib/python3.6/json/__init__.py:354: in loads

    return _default_decoder.decode(s)

conda/cpu/py3/lib/python3.6/json/decoder.py:339: in decode

    obj, end = self.raw_decode(s, idx=_w(s, 0).end())

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 



self = <json.decoder.JSONDecoder object at 0x7f64a4946208>

s = '{"data": [{"title": "Super_Bowl_50", "paragraphs": [{"context": "Super Bowl 50 was an American football game to deter...rkers in the poor countries"}, {"answer_start": 239, "text": "low-skilled workers in the poor countries"}, {"answer_st'

idx = 0



    def raw_decode(self, s, idx=0):

        """Decode a JSON document from ``s`` (a ``str`` beginning with

        a JSON document) and return a 2-tuple of the Python

        representation and the index in ``s`` where the document ended.

    

        This can be used to decode a JSON document from a string that may

        have extraneous data at the end.

    

        """

        try:

>           obj, end = self.scan_once(s, idx)

E           json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Unterminated string starting at: line 1 column 3342327 (char 3342326)



conda/cpu/py3/lib/python3.6/json/decoder.py:355: JSONDecodeError


```
